item.title: Fence has become detached from fence posts and is falling over the path causing obstruction. This is a path well used by local walkers and school children., 24th October
item.description:
On the path near Robinswood cottages.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On the path opposite the Gables, 24th October
item.description:
Broken concrete cover leaving a gaping hole in the path. The path is very narrow at this point and the broken concrete cover, covers most of the width of the path Someone has stuck a bollard over the cover which blocks most of the path however this is better than someone putting a foot down the hole and breaking an ankle. This is extremely dangerous as no street lights in Shipton and it would be easy to miss the broken cover in the dark or trip over the bollard if still in place
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
